titles.title: For the relief of Alfonso Quezada-Bonilla.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/25/2002--Introduced. Declares Alfonso Quezada-Bonilla to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act. Directs the Attorney General to rescind any outstanding order of removal or deportation entered against him.
